disclaimer: This is a web version of [i]Tsukihime[/i], a visual novel published on 2000 by Type-Moon.
The game contains adult content and is intended for mature audiences only.

about.port: This is a web version of [i]Tsukihime[/i], a visual novel published on 2000 by Type-Moon
about.data: No data collected, everything is stored in your browser. Manage your data [url='/config?tab=Advanced']here[/url]
about.remake: Support by buying the remake [url='http://typemoon.com/products/tsukihime/']Tsukime - A piece of blue glass moon[/url]

config.adult-warn: Warn me when I enter an H scene
config.data-erase-warning: This will delete all saves, reset all settings and progress. Are you sure?
config.data-erase-confirm: All data have been deleted. If you leave this website without making any change to the settings and without starting a new game, no data will remain stored on your computer

saves.delete-warning: Are you sure you want to delete this save ?
saves.overwrite-warning: Are you sure you want to overwrite this save?

skip-named: You have already seen the scene
Do you want to skip it?
game.skip-unnamed: You have already seen this scene. Do you want to skip it?
game.toast-hscene-waning: You are about to read an H-scene. Beware of your surroundings.
